DOC.detailed_description: Context : Patients chronic constipation due food hypersensitivity ( FH ) elevate anal sphincter rest pressure . No study investigate possible role FH anal fissure ( AF ) . Objective : We aim evaluate 1 ) effectiveness diet cure AF ; 2 ) clinical effect double-blind placebo control ( DBPC ) challenge cow 's milk protein wheat . Design : The study two different part : first verify effectiveness oligo-antigenic diet chronic AF treatment ; second search possible cause-effect relationship diet onset AF . Setting : We enrol consecutive adult patient chronic AF refer Surgical Department University Palermo 3-years period . Inclusion criterion : evidence CAF evaluate experienced rectal surgeon ; patient age > 16 year . Exclusion criterion : diagnosis inflammatory bowel disease , ongoing steroid treatment perform reason , exclusion diet follow reason , pregnancy . At time first evaluation , routine laboratory test , immunology test , rectal biopsy anal-rectal manometry perform . Patients : patient , finally include study , randomize one treatment group . Interventions : Enrolled patient randomize receive `` true elimination diet '' `` sham elimination diet '' ; group also receive topical nifedipine lidocaine . Main Outcome Measures : The patient evaluate every two week CAF persistence healing ; anal pain score visual analogue scale range 0 ( absence pain ) 10 ( intolerable pain ) . Anal-rectal manometry repeat end study period , patient treat .
